title: Meghan Robson on Credit Market, Saks Bonds Slump
description: Meghan Robson, head of US credit strategy at BNP Paribas discusses the credit market and Sacs bond slump in an interview with Scarlet Fu on "Real Yield." (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Meghan Robson, head of US credit strategy at BNP Paribas discusses the credit market and Sacs bond slump in an interview with Scarlet Fu on "Real Yield." (Source: Bloomberg)
